tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE outliers_dataset (
    record_id INT NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,
    feature_1 FLOAT,
    feature_2 FLOAT,
    feature_3 FLOAT,
    date_recorded DATE
)

CREATE TABLE anomaly_results (
    result_id INT NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,
    record_id INT,
    is_anomaly BOOLEAN,
    anomaly_score FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE algorithm_parameters (
    algorithm_id INT NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,
    algorithm_name VARCHAR(50),
    parameter_name VARCHAR(50),
    parameter_value VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE dataset_info (
    dataset_id INT NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,
    dataset_name VARCHAR(100),
    dataset_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE anomaly_logs (
    log_id INT NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,
    record_id INT,
    log_message TEXT,
    log_time TIMESTAMP
)
